description.value:
An Oathbreaker Paladin loses previously gained oath spells and instead gains the following Oathbreaker spells at the Paladin levels listed.

Oathbreaker Spells
Paladin LevelSpells
3rd@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplHellishReb]{Hellish Rebuke}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplInflictWou]{Inflict Wounds}
5th@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplCrownOfMad]{Crown of Madness}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplDarkness00]{Darkness}
9th@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplAnimateDea]{Animate Dead}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplBestowCurs]{Bestow Curse}
13th@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplBlight0000]{Blight}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplConfusion0]{Confusion}
17th@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplContagion0]{Contagion}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplDominatePe]{Dominate Person}
